TEXT.English: If you are looking for a truly epic experience, this map size is for you. It has room for you and 23 opponents.
TEXT.French: Si vous voulez vivre une véritable épopée, cette carte est faite pour vous. Elle est immense et oppose 23 adversaires.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie eine unvergessliche Erfahrung suchen, ist diese Karte Ihre erste Wahl. Immerhin treffen Sie hier auf bis zu 23 Gegner!
TEXT.Italian: Se sei alla ricerca di un'esperienza davvero epica, la dimensione di questa mappa è quello che fa per te, poiché oltre a te c'è posto per altri dieci rivali.
TEXT.Spanish: Si queréis una experiencia épica de verdad, el tamaño de este mapa es lo que andáis buscando. Tiene espacio suficiente para vos y para otros diez rivales.

TEXT.English: If you are looking for a truly epic experience, this map size is for you. It has room for you and 23 opponents.
TEXT.French: Si vous voulez vivre une véritable épopée, cette carte est faite pour vous. Elle est immense et oppose 23 adversaires.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie eine unvergessliche Erfahrung suchen, ist diese Karte Ihre erste Wahl. Immerhin treffen Sie hier auf bis zu 23 Gegner!
TEXT.Italian: Se sei alla ricerca di un'esperienza davvero epica, la dimensione di questa mappa è quello che fa per te, poiché oltre a te c'è posto per altri dieci rivali.
TEXT.Spanish: Si queréis una experiencia épica de verdad, el tamaño de este mapa es lo que andáis buscando. Tiene espacio suficiente para vos y para otros diez rivales.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]-50%% Cost with [LINK=CIVIC_FOLKLORE]Folklore[\LINK]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]-50%% de Coût avec [LINK=CIVIC_FOLKLORE]Folklore[\LINK]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]-50%% Cost with [LINK=CIVIC_FOLKLORE]Folklore[\LINK]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]-50%% Cost with [LINK=CIVIC_FOLKLORE]Folklore[\LINK]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires [LINK=CIVIC_LIBERAL]Liberal[\LINK] civic to be active[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires coastal city
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requiert la doctrine [LINK=CIVIC_LIBERAL]Libéralisme[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requiert une Ville côtière
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Benötigt die [LINK=CIVIC_LIBERAL]Liberale[\LINK] Staatsform um aktiviert zu werden[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nur für Küstenstädte
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Requires [LINK=CIVIC_LIBERAL]Liberal[\LINK] civic to be active[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires coastal city
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires [LINK=CIVIC_LIBERAL]Liberal[\LINK] civic to be active[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires coastal city

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases Total [ICON_GOLD] Reserves by 50%[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2% Interest on [ICON_GOLD] Reserves
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente [ICON_GOLD] le trésor de 50%[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2% d'intérêts sur [ICON_GOLD] le trésor
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increases Total [ICON_GOLD] Reserves by 50%[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2% Interest on [ICON_GOLD] Reserves
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Increases Total [ICON_GOLD] Reserves by 50%[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2% Interest on [ICON_GOLD] Reserves

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Desert Tiles: +8[ICON_COMMERCE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-50% Cost of Cathedrals in All Cities[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Requires Desert in City Radius[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Déserts : +2[ICON_COMMERCE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-50% de coût des Cathédrales dans toutes les Villes [NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Requiert du Désert dans le périmètre de la Ville[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Wüstenfelder: +2[ICON_COMMERCE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-50% Kosten für Kathedralen in allen Städten[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Benötigt Wüste im Stadtradius[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants Scientific Victory when built
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Permet une Victoire Scientifique lorsque construit
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants Scientific Victory when built
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants Scientific Victory when built

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Defuses all nuclear weapons from all civilizations (one time effect)
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Détruit l'ensemble des armes nucléaires de toutes les civilisations (effet unique)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Defuses all nuclear weapons from all civilizations (one time effect)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Defuses all nuclear weapons from all civilizations (one time effect)

TEXT.English: Reduces the cost of unit upgrades by 50%
TEXT.French: Réduit le coût des améliorations d'unités de 50%
TEXT.German: Reduziert die Kosten von Einheitenmodernisierungen um 50%
TEXT.Italian: Reduces the cost of unit upgrades by 50%
TEXT.Spanish: Reduces the cost of unit upgrades by 50%
